languages.text: "Зачем так категорично? Мы вместе начали это. И вместе закончим".

traits.locale_text: "Зачем так категорично? Мы вместе начали это. И вместе закончим".
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

languages.text: "There's no need to be so drastic, is there? We started this together, and we will finish it together."
languages.original_text: "Зачем так категорично? Мы вместе начали это. И вместе закончим".

traits.locale_text: "Why be so adamant? We started this together, and we will finish this together."
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

traits.locale_text: "Why be so adamant? We started this together, and we will finish this together."
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

traits.locale_text: "Why be so adamant? We started this together, and we will finish it together."
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

traits.locale_text: "Why be so adamant? We started this together, and we will finish it together."
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

traits.locale_text: "There's no need to be so drastic, is there? We started this together, and we will finish it together."
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

traits.locale_text: "There's no need to be so drastic, is there? We started this together, and we will finish it together."
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

languages.text: "Es gibt doch keinen Grund, gleich so drastisch zu werden. Wir haben das gemeinsam begonnen, wir werden es auch gemeinsam zu Ende bringen."
languages.original_text: "There's no need to be so drastic, is there? We started this together, and we will finish it together."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt doch keinen Grund, gleich so drastisch zu werden. Wir haben das gemeinsam begonnen, wir werden es auch gemeinsam zu Ende bringen."
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

languages.text: «No hace falta ser tan drásticos, ¿no? Hemos empezado esto juntos y lo terminaremos juntos».
languages.original_text: "There's no need to be so drastic, is there? We started this together, and we will finish it together."

traits.locale_text: «No hace falta ser tan drásticos, ¿no? Hemos empezado esto juntos y lo terminaremos juntos».
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

languages.text: 「そんな思い切ったことをする必要はないだろ？一緒に始めたんだから、一緒に終わらせればいい」
languages.original_text: "There's no need to be so drastic, is there? We started this together, and we will finish it together."

traits.locale_text: 「そんな思い切ったことをする必要はないだろ？一緒に始めたんだから、一緒に終わらせればいい」
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

languages.text: “话没必要说到这个份上，你说呢？既然这件事情是我们一起开始的，那我们也得一起完成。”
languages.original_text: "There's no need to be so drastic, is there? We started this together, and we will finish it together."

traits.locale_text: “话没必要说到这个份上，你说呢？既然这件事情是我们一起开始的，那我们也得一起完成。”
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart

languages.text: « Inutile d'être aussi radical. Nous avons commencé ensemble, et ensemble nous finirons. »
languages.original_text: "There's no need to be so drastic, is there? We started this together, and we will finish it together."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile d'être aussi radical. Nous avons commencé ensemble, et ensemble nous finirons. »
traits.speaker: IMFlamingHeart
